chapter.text: 43|1|haaa meem.
43|2|shapath hai pratyaksh (khulee) pustak kee.
43|3|ise hamane banaaya hai arabee quraan, taaki ve ise samajh saken.
43|4|tatha vah mool pustak[1] mein hai, hamaare paas, bada uchch tatha gyaan se paripoorn hai.
43|5|to kya ham pher den, is shiksha ko, tumase, isalie ki tum ullanghanakaaree log ho
43|6|tatha hamane bheje hain bahut-se nabee (guzaree huyee) jaatiyon mein.
43|7|aur nahin aata raha unake paas koee nabee, parantu ve usake saath upahaas karate rahe.
43|8|to hamane vinaash kar diya inase[1] adhik shaktivaanon ka tatha guzar chuka hai agalon ka udaaharan.
43|9|aur yadi aap prashn karen unase ki kisane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko? to avashy kahengeh unhen paida kiya hai bade prabhaavashaalee, sab kuchh jaanane vaale ne.
43|10|jisane banaaya tumahaare lie dharatee ko paalana aur banaaye usamen tumhaare lie maarg, taaki tum maarg pa sako.
43|11|tatha jisane utaara aakaash se jal, ek vishesh maatra mein. phir jeevit kar diya usake davaara murda bhoomi ko. isee prakaar, tum (dharatee se) nikaale jaoge.
43|12|tatha jisane paida kiye sab prakaar ke jode tatha banaeen tumhaare lie naukaayen tatha pashu jinapar tum savaar hote ho.

43|13|taaki tum savaar ho unake oopar, phir yaad karo apane paalanahaar ke pradaan ko, jab savaar ho jao usapar aur ye[1] kahoh pavitr hai vah, jisane vash mein kar diya hamaare lie ise. anyatha ham ise vash mein nahin kar sakate the.
43|14|tatha ham avashy hee apane paalanahaar hee kee or phirakar jaane vaale hain.
43|15|aur bana liya unhonne[1] usake bhakton mein se kuchh ko usaka ansh. vaastav mein, manushy khula krtaghn hai.
43|16|kya allaah ne usamen se, jo paida karata hai, putriyaan bana lee hain tatha tumhen vishesh kar diya hai putron ke saath

43|17|jabaki unamen se kisee ko shubh soochana dee jaaye us (ke janm lene) kee, jisaka usane udaaharan diya hai atyant krpaasheel ke lie, to usaka mukh kaala[1] ho jaata hai aur shok se bhar jaata hai.
43|18|kya (allaah ke lie) vah hai, jisaka paalanaposhan aabhooshan mein kiya jaata hai tatha vah vivaad mein khulakar baat nahin kar sakatee
43|19|aur unhonne bana diya farishton ko, jo atyant krpaasheel ke bhakt hain, putriyaan. kya ve upasthit the unakee utpatti ke samay? likh lee jaayegee unakee gavaahee aur unase poochh hogee.
43|20|tatha unhonne kaha ki yadi atyant krpaasheel chaahata, to ham unakee ibaadat nahin karate. unhen isaka koee gyaan nahin. vah keval teer-tukke chala rahe hain.
43|21|kya hamane unhen pradaan kee hai koee pustak isase pahale, jise ve drdhata se pakade hue hain
43|22|balki, ye kahate hain ki hamane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko ek reeti par aur ham unheen ke padchinhon par chal rahe hain.

43|23|tatha (he nabee!) isee prakaar, hamane nahin bhejee aapase poorv kisee bastee mein koee saavadhaan karane vaala, parantu kaha usake sukhee logon neh hamane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko ek reeti par aur ham nishchay unheen ke padchinhon par chal rahe hain.

43|24|nabee ne kahaah kya (tum unheen ka anugaman karoge) yadpi main laaya hoon tumhaare paas usase adhik seedha maarg, jisapar tumane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko? to unhonne kahaah ham, jis (dharm) ke saath tum bheje gaye ho, use maanane vaale nahin hai.
43|25|antatah, hamane badala chuka liya unase. to dekho ki kaisa raha jhuthalaane vaalon ka dushparinaam.
43|26|tatha yaad karo, jab kaha ibraaheem ne apane pita tatha apanee jaati seh nishchay main virakt hoon usase, jisakee vandana tum karate ho.
43|27|usake atirikt, jisane mujhe paida kiya hai. vahee mujhe raah dikhaayega.
43|28|tatha chhod gaya vah is baat (ekeshvaravaad) ko[1] apanee santaan mein, taaki ve shirk se bachate rahen.
43|29|balki, mainne inhen tatha inake baap-daada ko jeevan ka saamaan diya. yahaan tak ki aa gaya unake paas saty (quraan) aur ek khula rasool.
43|30|tatha jab aa gaya unake paas saty, to unhonne kah diya ki ye jaadoo hai tatha ham, ise maanane vaale nahin hain.
43|31|tatha unhonne kaha ki kyon nahin utaara[1] gaya ye quraan, do bastiyon mein se kisee bade vyakti par

43|32|kaya vahee baantate[1] hain aapake paalanahaar kee daya? hamane baantee hai, unake beech, unakee jeevika saansaarik jeevan mein tatha hamane uchch kiya hai, unamen se ek ko doosare par, kaee shreniyaan. taaki ek-doosare se seva kaary len tatha aapake paalanahaar kee daya[1] usase uttam hai, jise ve ikattha kar rahe hain.

43|33|aur yadi ye baat na hotee ki sabhee log ek hee neeti par ho jaate, to ham avashy bana dete unake lie, jo kuphr karate hain atyant krpaasheel ke saath, unake gharon kee chhaten chaandee kee tatha seedhiyaan jinapar ve chadhate hain.
43|34|tatha unake gharon ke dvaar aur takht jinapar ve takiye lagaaye[1] rahate hain.
43|35|tatha bana dete shobha. nahin hain ye sab kuchh, parantu saansaarik jeevan ke saamaan tatha aakhirat[1] (paralok) aapake paalanahaar ke yahaan keval aagyaakaariyon ke lie hai.
43|36|aur jo vyakti atyant krpaasheel (allaah) ke smaran se andha ho jaata hai, to ham usapar ek shaitaan niyukt kar dete hain, jo usaka saathee ho jaata hai.
43|37|aur ve (shaitaan) unhen rokate hain seedhee raah se tatha ve samajhate hain ki ve seedhee raah par hain.
43|38|yahaan tak ki jab vah hamaare paas aayega, to ye kaamana karega ki mere tatha tere (shaitaan ke) beech pashchim tatha poorv kee dooree hotee. too bura saathee hai.
43|39|(unase kaha jaayegaah) aur tumhen kadaapi koee laabh nahin hoga aaj, jabaki tumane atyaachaar kar liya hai. vaastav mein, tum sab yaatana mein saajhee rahoge.
43|40|to (he nabee!) kya aap suna lenge baharon ko ya seedhee raah dikha denge andhon ko tatha unhen, jo khule kupath[1] mein hon
43|41|phir yadi ham aapako (sansaar se) le jaayen, to bhee ham unase badala lene vaale hain.
43|42|athava aapako dikha den, jis (yaatana) ka hamane unako vachan diya hai, to nishchay ham unapar saamarthy rakhane vaale hain.
43|43|to (he nabee!) aap drdhata se pakade rahen use, jo ham aapakee or vahyee kar rahe hain. vaastav mein, aap seedhee raah par hain.
43|44|nishchay ye quraan, aapake lie tatha aapakee jaati ke lie ek shiksha[1] hai aur jald hee tumase prashn[2] kiya jaayega.
43|45|tatha he nabee! aap poochh len unase jinhen hamane bheja hai, aapase pahale, apane rasoolon mein se ki kya hamane banaaye hain atyant krpaasheel ke atirikt vandaneey, jinakee vandana kee jaaye
43|46|tatha hamane bheja moosa ko apanee nishaaniyon ke saath firaun aur usake pramukhon kee or. to usane kahaah vaastav mein, main sarvalok ke paalanahaar ka rasool hoon.
43|47|aur jab vah unake paas laaya hamaaree nishaaniyaan, to sahasa ve unakee hansee udaane lage.
43|48|tatha ham unhen ek se badh kar ek nishaanee dikhaate rahe aur hamane pakad liya unhen yaatana mein, taaki ve (thattha) se ruk jaayen.
43|49|aur unhonne kahaah he jaadoogar! praarthana kar hamaare lie apane paalanahaar se, us vachan ke aadhaar par, jo tujhase kiya hai. vaastav mein, ham seedhee raah par aa jaayenge.
43|50|to jaise hee hamane door kee unase yaatana, to ve sahasa vachan todane lage.
43|51|tatha pukaara firaun ne apanee jaati mein. usane kahaah he meree jaati! kya nahin hai mere lie misr ka raajy tatha ye naharen, jo bah rahee hain mere neeche se? to kya tum dekh nahin rahe ho
43|52|main achchha hoon ya vah jo apamaanit (heen) hai aur khulakar bol bhee nahin sakata
43|53|kyon nahin utaare gaye usapar sone ke kangan athava aaye farishte usake saath pankti baandhe hue
43|54|to usane jhaansa de diya apanee jaati ko aur sabane usakee baat maan lee. vaastav mein, ve the hee avagyaakaaree log.
43|55|phir jab unhonne hamen krodhit kar diya, to hamane unase badala le liya aur sabako dubo diya.
43|56|aur bana diya hamane unako gaya-guzara aur ek udaaharan, pashchaat ke logon ke lie.
43|57|tatha jab diya gaya maryam ke putr ka[1] udaaharan, to sahasa aapakee jaati usase prasann hokar shor machaane lagee.
43|58|tatha mushrikon ne kaha ki hamaare devata achchhe hain ya ve? unhonne nahin diya ye (udaaharan) aapako, parantu kutark (jhagadane) ke lie. balki, ve hain hee bade jhagadaaloo log.
43|59|nahin hai vah[1] (eesa), parantu ek bhakt (daas) jisapar hamane upakaar kiya tatha use israeel kee santaan ke lie ek aadarsh banaaya.
43|60|aur yadi ham chaahate, to bana dete tumhaare badale farishte dharatee mein, jo ek-doosare ka sthaan lete.
43|61|tatha vaastav mein, vah (eesa) ek bada lakshan[1] hain pralay ka. atah, kadaapi sandeh na karo pralay ke vishay mein aur meree hee baat maano. yahee seedhee raah hai.
43|62|tatha tumhen kadaapi na rok de shaitaan. nishchay vah tumhaara khula shatru hai.

43|63|aur jab aa gaya eesa khulee nishaaniyaan lekar, to kahaah main laaya hoon tumhaare paas gyaan aur taaki ujaagar kar doon tumhaare lie vah kuchh baaten, jinamen tum vibhed kar rahe ho. atah, allaah se daro aur mera hee kaha maano.
43|64|vaastav mein, allaah hee mera paalanahaar tatha tumhaara paalanahaar hai. atah, usee kee vandana (ibaadat) karo yahee seedhee raah hai.
43|65|phir vibhed kar liya girohon[1] ne aapas mein. to vinaash hai unake lie jinhonne atyaachaar kiya, duhkhadaayee din kee yaatana se.
43|66|kya ve bas isakee prateeksha kar rahe hain ki pralay unapar sahasa aa pade aur unhen (usaka) sanvedan (bhee) na ho
43|67|sabhee mitr us din ek-doosare ke shatru ho jaayenge, aagyaakaariyon ke siva.
43|68|he mere bhakto! koee bhay nahin hai tumapar aaj aur na tum udaaseen hoge.
43|69|jo eemaan laaye hamaaree aayaton par tatha aagyaakaaree banakar rahe.
43|70|pravesh kar jao svarg mein, tum tatha tumhaaree patniyaan. tumhen prasann rakha jaayega.
43|71|phiraayee jaayengee unapar sone kee thaalen tatha pyaale aur usamen vah sab kuchh hoga, jise unaka man chaahega aur jise unakee aankhen dekhakar aanand lengee aur tumasab usamen sadaiv rahoge.
43|72|aur ye svarg hai, jisake tum uttaraadhikaaree banaaye gaye ho, apane karmon ke badale, jo tum kar rahe the.
43|73|tumhaare lie isamen bahut-se meve hain jinamen se tum khaate rahoge.
43|74|nihsandeh aparaadhee narak kee yaatana mein sadaavaasee honge.
43|75|unase (yaatana) halkee nahin kee jaayegee tatha ve usamen niraash honge.
43|76|aur hamane atyaachaar nahin kiya unapar, parantu vahee atyaachaaree the.
43|77|tatha ve pukaarenge ki he maalik![1] hamaara kaam hee tamaam kar de tera paraalanahaar. vah kahegaah tumhen isee dasha mein rahana hai.
43|78|(allaah kahegaah) ham tumhaare paas saty[1] laaye, kintu tumamen se adhiktar ko saty apriy tha.
43|79|kya unhonne kisee baat ka nirnay kar liya hai?[1] to ham bhee nirnay kar denge.
43|80|kya ve samajhate hain ki ham nahin sunate hain unakee gupt baaton tatha praamarsh ko? kyon nahin, balki hamaare farishte unake paas hee likh rahe hain.
43|81|(he nabee!) aap unase kah den ki yadi atyant krpaasheel (allaah) kee koee santaan hotee, to sabase pahale main usaka pujaaree hota.
43|82|pavitr hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar, sinhaasan ka svaamee un baaton se, jo ve kahate hain
43|83|to aap unhen chhod den, ve vaad-vivaad tatha khel-kood karate rahen, yahaan tak ki apane us din se mil jaayen, jisase unhen daraaya ja raha hai.
43|84|vahee hai, jo aakaash mein vandaneey aur dharatee mein vandaneey hai aur vahee haikmat aur gyaan vaala hai.
43|85|shubh hai vah, jisake adhikaar mein aakaashon tatha dharatee ka raajy hai tatha jo kuchh donon ke madhy hai tatha usee ke paas pralay ka gyaan hai aur usee kee or tumasab pratyaagat kiye jaoge.
43|86|tatha nahin adhikaar rakhate hain, jinhen ve pukaarate hain allaah ke atirikt, sifaarish ka. haan, (sifaarish ke yogy ve hain) jo saty[1] kee gavaahee den aur (use) jaanate bhee hon.
43|87|aur yadi aap unase prashn karen ki kisane paida kiya hai unhen? to ve avashy kahenge ki allaah ne. to phir ve kahaan phire ja rahe hain
43|88|tatha rasool kee ye baat ki, he mere paalanahaar! ye ve log hain, jo eemaan nahin laate.
43|89|to aap unase vimukh ho jaayen tatha kah den ki salaam[1] hai. sheeghr hee unhen gyaan ho jaayega.
